about_the_game:
The 'Death Proof' Edition of Unfortunate Spacemen comes with the following exclusives!



  • Death Proof Suit: A leather-padded spacesuit keeps you warm and cozy.
  • Death Proof Helmet: This fur-trimmed helmet keeps you warm and out of Big Trouble.
  • Death Proof Handgun: Comes with a unique look, unique sounds and visual effects!
  • Death Proof Assault Rifle: With a massive suppressor, unique sounds, scope and effects!
  • Meat Visor: You're just... You're just made of meat. Gross.
  • Cobra Visor: There's a little Snake in all of us.
  • "Flex" Victory Pose: You're lookin' real jacked, baby.
  • "The Spaceman" Victory Dance: Show off your rad Spaceman dancin' skills
  • Death Proof Name Plate: Show everyone you appreciate finely stitched leather.
  • Death Proof Spray: Show everyone you're cooler and less deaderer than them.

A NEARLY $40 VALUE FOR ONLY $25 WOW WHAT A SAVINGS

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence against Spacemen
Monsters eating Spacemen
Spacemen shooting other Spacemen
Spacemen shooting aliens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Become 'Death Proof' with the Collector's Edition of Unfortunate Spacemen! Bring your best look with a unique suit, helmet, 2 victory poses, 2 weapon skins, a spray, name plate and the meatiest visor in the galaxy!
